overview: In FILTHY McNASTIER, Phil the Demon is back to his old hijinks, this time granting the wish of a lonely gal who's lacking the voluptuous bosoms of her girlfriends.  But as always, there's a price to pay for her new look...and this time, Phil has the vampire Razor McBleed along for the fun!
tagline: Ladies?... Open wide and taste it!
title: Filthy McNastier: Maximum Dousche
